languages.text: "Домин'{name}, флагман без тебя был подобен телу без сердца — его кровь застыла в жилах. Мы рады твоему возвращению и готовы служить".
"Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."
languages.original_text: "Домин'{name}, флагман без тебя был подобен телу без сердца — его кровь застыла в жилах. Мы рады твоему возвращению и готовы служить".

traits.locale_text: "Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."
"Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."
"Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."
"Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."
"Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."

languages.text: “秘者{name}，你不在的这段时间里，这艘旗舰仿佛变成了一具失去心脏的尸体，就连血管中的血液都凝固了。我们欢迎你归来，随时准备为你服务。”
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."

traits.locale_text: “秘者{name}，你不在的这段时间里，这艘旗舰仿佛变成了一具失去心脏的尸体，就连血管中的血液都凝固了。我们欢迎你归来，随时准备为你服务。”

languages.text: «Domin'{name}, en su ausencia la nave insignia es como un cuerpo sin corazón: la sangre no circula por sus venas. Nos alegramos de su regreso y estamos listos para servirle».
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."

traits.locale_text: «Domin'{name}, en su ausencia la nave insignia es como un cuerpo sin corazón: la sangre no circula por sus venas. Nos alegramos de su regreso y estamos listos para servirle».

languages.text: 「ドミン・{name}、あなたのいない旗艦は心臓のない体のようです。血管の血が固まっているのです。あなたの復帰を歓迎し、奉仕します」
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン・{name}、あなたのいない旗艦は心臓のない体のようです。血管の血が固まっているのです。あなたの復帰を歓迎し、奉仕します」

languages.text: "Domin'{name}, ohne Euch glich das Flaggschiff einem Körper ohne Herz ... dessen Blut in den Adern gefriert. Wir freuen uns über Eure Rückkehr und sind bereit, Euch zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."

traits.locale_text: "Domin'{name}, ohne Euch glich das Flaggschiff einem Körper ohne Herz ... dessen Blut in den Adern gefriert. Wir freuen uns über Eure Rückkehr und sind bereit, Euch zu dienen."

languages.text: « Sans vous, Domin'{name}, le vaisseau amiral était pareil à un corps privé de son cœur battant dont le sang se serait figé dans ses veines. Nous sommes ravis de vous savoir de retour et nous nous tenons à votre disposition. »
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."

traits.locale_text: « Sans vous, Domin'{name}, le vaisseau amiral était pareil à un corps privé de son cœur battant dont le sang se serait figé dans ses veines. Nous sommes ravis de vous savoir de retour et nous nous tenons à votre disposition. »

languages.text: "Domin'{name}, sancak gemisi sen olmadan kalpsiz bir bedeni andırır. Kanı, damarlarında donakalır. Geri dönüşünden dolayı çok memnunuz ve sana hizmet etmeye hazırız."
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, the flagship without you was like a body without a heart — its blood froze in its veins. We welcome your return and stand ready to serve."
